name: Legendary Racing
description:
Legendary Racing is a racing 3D game for iOS device for FREE !!.

Learn the story of old glory racing from 60's to the modern world! Complete Career Mode and become a legend of Legendary Racing.

The game includes the following features:

1. Possibilities to change the camera view in different ways 3D,2D, frontal , lateral and many more angles
2. Weather changing
3. Single Race, Career , Championship
4. Standard control, Tilt control and accelerometer control.
5. Right and left hand controls
6. Eight different tracks with different grip control and performance.
7. Different team selection with different performance and tire grip controls.
8 Different decade of play from '60 until today's race.
9. Possibilities to view opponent's camera during in game mode
